## Load libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


## Load plant list
```{r}
plants<-read_csv("data/COplants5312018.txt")
plant_form<-read_csv("data/plant_list_with_growth_habit.csv")
```

```{r}
plants
plant_form
```

```{r}
final_plant_list<-plants%>%
  left_join(select(plant_form,Symbol,3))
final_plant_list
```

## Get one unique value per symbol
```{r}
final_plant_list_sub<-final_plant_list[match(unique(final_plant_list$Symbol), final_plant_list$Symbol),]
final_plant_list_sub
```

## Write CSV
```{r}
write_csv(final_plant_list_sub, "data/plant_list_with_growth_type.csv")
```
